attributes.action: Allow victims of violent crime the same self-defence tools America has
attributes.additional_details:
The self-defence items currently legal here in the UK leave victims of violent crime feeling very restricted.  All we have are loud noise devices the size of key-ring fobs  and a spray gel that only marks the assailant for identification - not deter them like illegal pepper spray. 

How will this ever save lives if the police are not at hand?
attributes.background: Legalise non-firearm self-defence items to be purchased online and across the counter for vulnerable citizens only.  No more prosecutions for endangered Britons who have only made these purchases to defend themselves.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We understand you would like some people to be able to carry some items, but we're not sure exactly who or what you'd like to be covered.
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
